div.style: position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0px; background: #FFFFFF;

img.style: width: 41px; vertical-align: middle; padding: 10px; border-left: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12); border-right: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12);

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 component_container component_container_textwindow

div.span: All Anderson Union High School District sites will be
. Continue to check this page as we provide the most recent information regarding free meals, enrichment opportunities, and more through the closure.

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-lg-6 component_container component_container_textwindow
col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-lg-6 component_container component_container_textwindow

span.div: Be sure to check your student's email and login to their Google Classrooms for class specific enrichment opportunities. Currently, work will not be required or graded, but all students are encouraged to engage in academic actitives as teachers share them.

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 component_container component_container_textwindow
div.h3: FREE MEALS FOR KIDS DURING CLOSURE

span.div: The Nutrition Services Department will be providing free sack breakfasts/lunches for all students and children up to 18 years old through the school closure. Students must be present to be given a meal. Meals will be handed out in a "grab & go" style and may be picked up at the following locations and times. Please note that cafeterias will not be open for dining.

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-lg-6 component_container component_container_textwindow

span.p: Click here to see other free meal options
